Constructs a {{tt|month_day_last}} object that represents the last day of the month {{c|m}}.

===Notes===
A more convenient way to construct a {{tt|month_day_last}} is with {{tt|operator/}}, e.g., {{c|std::chrono::April/std::chrono::last}}.
